The new value of the setting.

member.name: T:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy
member.summary: Service to control/query all aspects of recording and tuning.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a channel to the service.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetAllPluginServices(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get all configured plugin services.
member.param: Set to true to only receive active plugins.
member.returns: An array containing zero or more plugin services.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.SavePluginService(ArgusTV.DataContracts.PluginService)
member.summary: Save a new or modified plugin service. A new plugin service is recognized by a Guid.Empty ID.
member.param: The plugin service to save.
member.returns: The saved plugin service.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.DeletePluginService(System.Guid)
member.summary: Delete a plugin service.
member.param: The ID of the plugin service to delete.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.PingPluginService(ArgusTV.DataContracts.PluginService)
member.summary: Ask ARGUS TV to test the connection to a recorder by pinging it.
member.param: The plugin service to ping.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.AreRecordingSharesAccessible(ArgusTV.DataContracts.PluginService)
member.summary: Check if the ARGUS TV service has the needed access rights on the recording shares of the given pluginService.
member.param: The pluginService.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetRecordingDisksInfo
member.summary: Get information (free disk space) from all recording disks.
member.returns: A RecordingDisksInfo entity with all disk(s) information.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetRecordingShares
member.summary: Get all the recording shares configured for the current recorder(s).
member.returns: A list containing zero or more recording shares.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetFullRecordings(ArgusTV.DataContracts.ChannelType,System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get all recordings for the given criteria. You must specificy at least one criterium other than the channel type.
member.param: The channel-type of the recordings.
The schedule ID of the recordings, or null.
The program title of the recordings, or null.
The category of the recordings, or null.
The channel ID of the recordings, or null.
If true also return recording entries for which the recording file is missing.
member.returns: Returns a list of zero or more recordings.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetAllRecordingGroups(ArgusTV.DataContracts.ChannelType,ArgusTV.DataContracts.RecordingGroupMode)
member.summary: Get all recording groups based on the recording group-mode.
member.param: The channel-type of the recordings.
The recording group-mode.
member.returns: An array of zero or more recording schedule-groups.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetRecordingsForSchedule(System.Guid,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get all recordings for the given original schedule.
member.param: The ID of the schedule.
If true also return recording entries for which the recording file is missing.
member.returns: An array of zero or more recordings.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetRecordingsForProgramTitle(ArgusTV.DataContracts.ChannelType,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get all recordings for the given program title.
member.param: The channel-type of the recordings.
The program title.
If true also return recording entries for which the recording file is missing.
member.returns: An array of zero or more recordings.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetRecordingsForProgramTitles(ArgusTV.DataContracts.ChannelType,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get all recordings for the given program titles.
member.param: The channel-type of the recordings.
A list of program titles.
If true also return recording entries for which the recording file is missing.
member.returns: A list of a list of zero or more recordings, so a list per given title.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetRecordingsForCategory(ArgusTV.DataContracts.ChannelType,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get all recordings for the given program category.
member.param: The channel-type of the recordings.
The program category.
If true also return recording entries for which the recording file is missing.
member.returns: An array of zero or more recordings.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetRecordingsOnChannel(System.Guid,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get all recordings on the given channel.
member.param: The ID of the channel.
If true also return recording entries for which the recording file is missing.
member.returns: An array of zero or more recordings.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetRecordingByFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Get the recording associated with the given filename.
member.param: The full path of the recording file.
member.returns: The recording, or null if none is found.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.DeleteRecording(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Delete a recording.
member.param: The filename of the recording.
Set to true to also delete the recording file.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetRecordingById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get the recording by its unique ID.
member.param: The ID of the recording.
member.returns: The recording, or null if none is found.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetRecordingLastWatchedPosition(System.String)
member.summary: Get the position (in seconds) to where the recording was last watched. Or null if it was never watched.
member.param: The filename of the recording.
member.returns: The position in seconds or null.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.SetRecordingLastWatchedPosition(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Set the position (in seconds) to where the recording was last watched, or null to reset the state to never-watched.
member.param: The filename of the recording.
The position in seconds or null.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.SetRecordingFullyWatchedCount(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the number of times a recording was fully watched.
member.param: The filename of the recording.
The number of times the recording was fully watched.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.SetRecordingLastWatched(System.String)
member.summary: Mark a recording as last watched now (can be used by playback engines that don't support the last-watched position).
member.param: The filename of the recording.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.SetRecordingKeepUntil(System.String,ArgusTV.DataContracts.KeepUntilMode,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Set the keep mode and value of an existing recording.
member.param: The filename of the recording.
The keep until mode to use for this recording.
The keep until value to use for this recording, or null if the mode doesn't require a value.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetPreviouslyRecordedHistory(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get the history of programs that have been recorded by this schedule. This list is the one used to make the NewEpisodesOnly and NewTitlesOnly rules work.
member.param: The ID of the schedule.
member.returns: An array containing zero or more recorded programs.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.AddToPreviouslyRecordedHistory(ArgusTV.DataContracts.UpcomingProgram)
member.summary: Add an upcoming program to the list of previously recorded programs of its schedule. This list is the one used to make the NewEpisodesOnly and NewTitlesOnly rules work.
member.param: The upcoming program to add to the history.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.RemoveFromPreviouslyRecordedHistory(ArgusTV.DataContracts.UpcomingProgram)
member.summary: Remove an upcoming program from the list of previously recorded programs of its schedule. This list is the one used to make the NewEpisodesOnly and NewTitlesOnly rules work.
member.param: The upcoming program to remove from the history.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.ImportPreviouslyRecordedHistory(System.Guid,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleRecordedProgram})
member.summary: Import a history of programs that have been recorded by this schedule. This list is the one used to make the NewEpisodesOnly and NewTitlesOnly rules work.
member.param: The ID of the schedule.
An array containing zero or more recorded programs.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.DeleteFromPreviouslyRecordedHistory(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete a recorded program from the previously recorded history of its schedule.
member.param: The ID of the recorded program.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.ClearPreviouslyRecordedHistory(System.Guid)
member.summary: Delete the previously recorded history of a schedule.
member.param: The ID of the schedule.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.ImportRecording(ArgusTV.DataContracts.Recording)
member.summary: Import a new recording into the system. A new RecordingId will be auto-generated, so this can be left Guid.Empty. If ScheduleId and ChannelId are not known, you may generate your own (new unique) Guid and pass that in.
member.param: The recording to import.
member.returns: True if the recording was imported succesfully, false if the recording filename was already imported.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.ChangeRecordingFile(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Change the recording filename for an existing recording. Can be used after moving or transcoding a file.
member.param: The full path of the current recording file (UNC).
The full path of the new recording file to use (UNC).
The new recording start-time (in case of trimming), or null to keep the existing time.
The new recording stop-time (in case of trimming), or null to keep the existing time.
member.returns: True if the recording was found and modified succesfully, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.RunProcessingCommandOnRecording(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Schedule a processing command to run on a recording.
member.param: The unique ID of the recording.
The unique ID of the processing command.
The time and date at which to run the command.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetRecordingThumbnail(System.Guid,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.DateTime)
member.summary: Get a resized recording thumbnail, if newer than the provided timestamp. The aspect ratio of the original thumbnail is preserved so the returned image will be potentially either smaller than the requested size, or centered on a background. If both width and height are set to 0, the full size thumbnail will be returned.
member.param: The requested width, 0 to get the width according to the aspect.
The requested height, 0 to get the height according to the aspect.
The optional RGB color of the background, null to return the scaled image as is.
Only return a thumbnail if it is newer than the given timestamp.
member.returns: A byte array containing the bytes of a JPG of the resized thumbnail, an empty array if no newer thumbnail was found or null if no thumbnail was found.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.StartRecordingStream(System.String)
member.summary: Start RTSP streaming of the given recording.
member.param: The filename of the recording.
member.returns: The RTSP url of the recording stream.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.StopRecordingStream(System.String)
member.summary: Stop RTSP streaming of the given recording.
member.param: The RTSP url of the recording stream.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetAllUpcomingRecordings(ArgusTV.DataContracts.UpcomingRecordingsFilter,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get all upcoming recordings.
member.param: Set filter to retrieve recordings and/or cancelled recordings.
Set to true to include upcoming recordings that are currently being recorded.
member.returns: An array with zero or more upcoming recordings.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetNextUpcomingRecording(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the first upcoming recording that's not cancelled or unallocated.
member.param: Set to true to include upcoming recordings that are currently being recorded.
member.returns: Null or an upcoming (or active) recording.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetUpcomingRecordings(System.Guid,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get upcoming recordings for a specific schedule.
member.param: The ID of the schedule.
Set to true to also retrieve cancelled programs.
member.returns: An array with zero or more upcoming recordings.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetActiveRecordings
member.summary: Get the currently active recordings.
member.returns: An array with zero or more active recordings.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.IsRecordingPendingOrActive(System.Guid)
member.summary: Check if a recording has started or is pending.
member.param: The ID of the recording's upcoming program.
member.returns: True if the recording has started (or is pending), false if it has not.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.AbortActiveRecording(ArgusTV.DataContracts.ActiveRecording)
member.summary: Abort an active recording.
member.param: The active recording to abort.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.TuneLiveStream(ArgusTV.DataContracts.Channel,ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream@)
member.summary: Tune to a channel, and get a live RTSP stream to that channel.
member.param: The channel to tune to.
Reference to a live stream (RTSP) that is either existing or null for a new one.
member.returns: A LiveStreamResult value to indicate success or failure.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.StopLiveStream(ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream)
member.summary: Stop the live stream.
member.param: The live stream (RTSP) of the stream to stop.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetLiveStreams
member.summary: Get all live streams.
member.returns: An array of zero or more live streams.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.KeepLiveStreamAlive(ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream)
member.summary: Tell the recorder we are still showing this stream and to keep it alive. Call this every 30 seconds or so.
member.param: The live stream (RTSP) that is stil in use.
member.returns: True if the live stream is still running, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetLiveStreamTuningDetails(ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream)
member.summary: Ask the recorder for the give live stream's tuning details (if possible).
member.param: The active live stream.
member.returns: The service tuning details, or null if none are available.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetLiveStreamByRtspUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Get the live stream for a given RTSP url.
member.param: The RTSP url for which to find the live stream.
member.returns: The corresponding live stream.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetChannelsLiveState(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ArgusTV.DataContracts.Channel},ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream)
member.summary: Get the live tuning state of one or more channels.
member.param: The channels to get the current state from.
The live stream you want to be ignored (since it's yours), or null.
member.returns: Null, or an array with the respective live state for each of the given channels.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.HasTeletext(ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream)
member.summary: Ask the recorder whether the given live stream has teletext.
member.param: The live stream.
member.returns: True if teletext is present.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.StartGrabbingTeletext(ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream)
member.summary: Tell the recorder to start grabbing teletext for the given live stream.
member.param: The live stream.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.StopGrabbingTeletext(ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream)
member.summary: Tell the recorder to stop grabbing teletext for the given live stream.
member.param: The live stream.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.IsGrabbingTeletext(ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream)
member.summary: Ask the recorder whether it is grabbing teletext for the given live stream.
member.param: The live stream.
member.returns: True if the recorder is grabbing teletext.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetTeletextPage(ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Request a teletext page/subpage from the recorder for the given live stream.
member.param: The live stream.
The teletext page number
The teletext subpage number
member.returns: The requested teletext page, or null if the page was not ready yet.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ControlServiceProxy.GetTeletextPageImage(ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Request a teletext page/subpage from the recorder for the given live stream, as an image. Note that the page may contain transparent parts even if 'useTransparentBackground' is set to false (e.g. subtitle or newsflash page).
member.param: The live stream.
The teletext page number
The teletext subpage number
The width of the teletext image
The height of the teletext image
Use a transparent background instead of black.
Show the hidden teletext information.
member.returns: The requested teletext page in form of an image, or null if the page was not ready yet.

member.name: T:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.CoreServiceProxy
member.summary: Core service proxy.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.CoreServiceProxy.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a channel to the service.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.CoreServiceProxy.Ping(System.Int32)
member.summary: Ping ARGUS TV server and test the API version.
member.param: The API version the client needs, pass in Constants.CurrentApiVersion.
member.returns: 0 if client and server are compatible, -1 if the client is too old and +1 if the client is newer than the server.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.CoreServiceProxy.GetMacAddresses
member.summary: Get the server's MAC address(es). These can be stored on the client after a successful connect and later used to re-connect with wake-on-lan.
member.returns: An array containing one or more MAC addresses in HEX string format (e.g. "A1B2C3D4E5F6").

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.CoreServiceProxy.IsNewerVersionAvailable
member.summary: Check to see if there is a newer version of ARGUS TV available online.
member.returns: A NewVersionInfo object if there is a newer version available, null if the current installation is up-to-date.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.CoreServiceProxy.GetServerVersion
member.summary: Get the server's version as a string.
member.returns: Returns the ARGUS TV product version, for display purposes. Don't use this to do version checking!

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.CoreServiceProxy.SubscribeServiceEvents(System.String,ArgusTV.DataContracts.EventGroup)
member.summary: Subscribe your client to a group of ARGUS TV events using a polling mechanism.
member.param: The unique ID (e.g. your DNS hostname combined with a constant GUID) to identify your client.
The event group(s) to subscribe to (flags can be OR'd).

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.CoreServiceProxy.UnsubscribeServiceEvents(System.String)
member.summary: Unsubscribe your client from all ARGUS TV events.
member.param: The unique ID (e.g. your DNS hostname combined with a constant GUID) to identify your client.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.CoreServiceProxy.GetServiceEvents(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get all queued ARGUS TV events for your client. Call this every X seconds to get informed at a regular interval about what happened.
member.param: The unique ID (e.g. your DNS hostname combined with a constant GUID) to identify your client.
The cancellation token to potentially abort the request (or CancellationToken.None).
The maximum timeout of the request (default is 5 minutes).
member.returns: Zero or more service events, or null in case your subscription has expired.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.CoreServiceProxy.KeepServerAlive
member.summary: Tell the server we'd like to keep it alive for a little longer. A client should call this method every two minutes or so to keep the server from entering standby (if it is configured to do so).

member.name: T:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy
member.summary: Service to control/query all aspects of TV guide data.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a channel to the service.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.AddChannel(System.String,System.String,ArgusTV.DataContracts.ChannelType)
member.summary: Add a new guide channel.
member.param: The XMLTV ID of the new channel.
The name of the channel.
The channel type of the channel to add.
member.returns: The ID of the new channel.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.DeleteChannel(System.Guid)
member.summary: Delete a guide channel. Any channels that are linked to this guide channel will have their link broken. All guide programs in the channel will also be deleted.
member.param: The ID of the guide channel to delete.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.SaveChannel(ArgusTV.DataContracts.GuideChannel)
member.summary: Save a modified or new guide channel. A new guide channel is recognized by a Guid.Empty ID.
member.param: The guide channel to save.
member.returns: The saved guide channel.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.EnsureChannelExists(System.String,System.String,ArgusTV.DataContracts.ChannelType)
member.summary: Ensure a guide channel exists.
member.param: The XMLTV ID of the new channel.
The name of the channel.
The channel type of the channel to ensure.
member.returns: The ID of the guide channel.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.GetAllChannels(ArgusTV.DataContracts.ChannelType)
member.summary: Get all guide channels.
member.param: The channel type of the channels to retrieve.
member.returns: An array containing zero or more guide channels.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.GetChannelByXmlTvId(System.String)
member.summary: Get a guide channel by its XMLTV ID.
member.param: The XMLTV ID.
member.returns: The guide channel, or null if not found.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.GetChannelByName(System.String)
member.summary: Get a guide channel by its name.
member.param: The name of the channel.
member.returns: The guide channel, or null if not found.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.ImportProgram(ArgusTV.DataContracts.GuideProgram,ArgusTV.DataContracts.GuideSource)
member.summary: Import a new program into the guide.
member.param: The program to import.
The source of the program.
member.returns: The ID of the imported program.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.ImportPrograms(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ArgusTV.DataContracts.GuideProgram},ArgusTV.DataContracts.GuideSource)
member.summary: Import several new progams into the guide.
member.param: An array containing all programs to import.
The source of the programs.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.GetProgramById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get a guide programs by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the guide program.
member.returns: The requested guide program, or null if it wasn't found.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.GetChannelsProgramsBetween(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid},System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Get all guide programs on the given channels, between the given lower and upper time.
member.param: An array containing all guide channel IDs.
Return programs that end after this time.
Return programs that start before this time.
member.returns: An array containing zero or more guide programs.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.GetChannelProgramsBetween(System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Get all guide programs on the given channel, between the given lower and upper time.
member.param: The guide channel ID.
Return programs that end after this time.
Return programs that start before this time.
member.returns: An array containing zero or more guide programs.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.GetAllCategories
member.summary: Get all available categories currently in the guide.
member.returns: An array containing zero or more categories.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.DeleteOldPrograms
member.summary: Delete old guide programs (everything before yesterday).

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.DeleteAllPrograms
member.summary: Delete all guide programs.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.StartGuideImport
member.summary: Notify ARGUS TV that a guide import has started. Call this before doing one or more ImportPrograms() calls.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.GuideServiceProxy.EndGuideImport
member.summary: Notify ARGUS TV that the guide import has ended. The NewGuideData event will be sent to all listeners.

member.name: T:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.LogServiceProxy
member.summary: High-level logging service.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.LogServiceProxy.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a channel to the service.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.LogServiceProxy.LogMessage(System.String,ArgusTV.DataContracts.LogSeverity,System.String)
member.summary: Log a message.
member.param: The name of the module that is logging the message.
The severity of the message.
The message text.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.LogServiceProxy.GetLogEntries(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32,System.String,System.Nullable{ArgusTV.DataContracts.LogSeverity},System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Get all log entries for a certain module.
member.param: Return messages logged after this date.
Return messages logged before this date.
The maximum number of messages to return.
The name of the module, or null.
The severity of the messages, or null.
Will be set to true if more than 'maxEntries' messages where available.
member.returns: An array containing zero or more log message.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.LogServiceProxy.GetAllModules
member.summary: Get all available modules currently in the log.
member.returns: An array containing zero or more module names.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.LogServiceProxy.SendTestMail
member.summary: Send a test-mail using the current SMTP settings.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.Proxies.Initialize(ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.ServerSettings,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initialize the factories for the given server settings.
member.param: Where to locate the ARGUS TV Scheduler service.
If set to true an exception may be thrown, if false any errors will be swallowed.
member.returns: If throwError was false, a boolean indicating success or failure.

member.summary: Make sure a channel exist and if it doesn't, add it and automatically link it to the guide channel with the same displayname (if found).

The display name of the channel.
Null, or a group name to place a newly created channel in.

The display name of the guide channel.

member.summary: Delete a channel group.
member.param: The ID of the group to delete.
Also delete channels in the group that are not in any other group.
Also delete the guide channels that are not used by any other channels.

member.summary: Delete a channel.
member.param: The ID of the channel to delete.
Also delete the guide channel if it is not used by any other channel.

member.summary: Save a modified or new channel. A new channel is recognized by a Guid.Empty ID.

member.returns: The saved channel.

member.summary: Save several modified or new channels. New channels are recognized by a Guid.Empty ID.

member.summary: Save a modified or new channel group. A new channel group is recognized by a Guid.Empty ID.
member.param: The channel group to save.
member.returns: The saved channel group.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SchedulerServiceProxy.GetChannelGroupMembers(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get channels members of a group. The order of the channels in the array is the sequence.
member.param: The ID of the parent channel group.
member.returns: A list of channels that are in the group.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SchedulerServiceProxy.SetChannelGroupMembers(System.Guid,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Set channels members of a group. The order of the channels in the array is saved as the sequence.
member.param: The ID of the parent channel group.
A list of channels that are in the group.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SchedulerServiceProxy.GetChannelGroupsForChannel(System.Guid,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get all the groups a channel belongs to.
member.param: The ID of the channel.
Set to true to only receive groups that are marked visible.
member.returns: A list containing the zero or more groups the given channel belongs to.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SchedulerServiceProxy.GetChannelLogo(System.Guid,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.DateTime,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Get a resized channel logo, if newer than the provided timestamp. The aspect ratio of the original image is preserved so the returned image is potentially either smaller than the requested size, or centered on a transparent background.
member.param: The ID of the channel.
The requested width.
The requested height.
Only return a logo if it is newer than the given timestamp.
Use a transparent background when preserving the aspect ratio.
The background color to use in case useTransparentBackground is false.
member.returns: A byte array containing the bytes of a (transparent) PNG of the resized logo, an empty array if no newer logo was found or null if no logo was found.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SchedulerServiceProxy.CreateNewSchedule(ArgusTV.DataContracts.ChannelType,ArgusTV.DataContracts.ScheduleType)
member.summary: Create a new schedule. All default processing commands will be added to the new schedule.
member.param: The channel-type of this schedule.
The type of the schedule.
member.returns: A new schedule without rules (note that you still need to call SaveSchedule() to save it).

The type of the schedules.

member.summary: Get all upcoming programs for the given type.

member.summary: Get all upcoming programs for the given type, with a start-time before the given date and time.

Only return programs with a start-time before this time.

member.summary: Get all upcoming programs for the given schedule.

member.returns: A list with zero or more upcoming programs.

member.summary: Cancel the specified program for the given schedule.

The ID of the guide program to cancel.

The start-time of the program to cancel.

The ID of the guide program to cancel.

member.summary: Set a priority for a specific upcoming program.

The upcoming program's start time.
The priority to use, or null to use the schedule's priority again.

member.summary: Set the pre-record time for a specific upcoming program.

The upcoming program's start time.
The number of pre-record seconds to use, or null to use the schedule's pre-record setting again.

member.summary: Set the post-record time for a specific upcoming program.

The upcoming program's start time.
The number of post-record seconds to use, or null to use the schedule's post-record setting again.

member.summary: Get all program titles that start with, or have a word that starts with the given text.
member.param: If not null, only search programs of this type.
The text to search for.
Set to true if you want to include programs that have already ended.
member.returns: A list containing zero or more program titles, ordered alphabetically.

member.summary: Search guide for programs whose title starts with, or has a word that starts with the given text.
member.param: If not null, only search programs of this type.
The text to search for.
Set to true if you want to include programs that have already ended.
member.returns: A list containing zero or more channel programs.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SchedulerServiceProxy.SearchGuideByTitle(System.Nullable{ArgusTV.DataContracts.ChannelType},System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Search guide for programs whose title equals the given text.
member.param: If not null, only search programs of this type.
The exact title to search for.
Set to true if you want to include programs that have already ended.
member.returns: A list containing zero or more channel programs.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SchedulerServiceProxy.GetCurrentAndNextForChannel(System.Guid,System.Boolean,ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream)
member.summary: Get the current and next program on the given channel.
member.param: The channel ID.
Set to true to receive the live state of all channels.
If you are including the live state, the live stream you want to be ignored (since it's yours), or null.
member.returns: A CurrentAndNextProgram item.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SchedulerServiceProxy.GetCurrentAndNextForChannels(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid},System.Boolean,ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the current and next program on the given channels.
member.param: The channel IDs.
Set to true to only receive channels that are marked visible.
Set to true to receive the live state of all channels.
If you are including the live state, the live stream you want to be ignored (since it's yours), or null.
member.returns: A list containing zero or more CurrentAndNextProgram items.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SchedulerServiceProxy.GetCurrentAndNextForGroup(System.Guid,System.Boolean,ArgusTV.DataContracts.LiveStream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the current and next program on all the channels in the given group.
member.param: The ID of the channel group.
Set to true to only receive channels that are marked visible.
Set to true to receive the live state of all channels.
If you are including the live state, the live stream you want to be ignored (since it's yours), or null.
member.returns: A list containing zero or more CurrentAndNextProgram items.

member.name: T:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SimpleJson
member.summary:
This class encodes and decodes JSON strings. Spec. details, see http://www.json.org/
JSON uses Arrays and Objects. These correspond here to the datatypes JsonArray(IList<object>) and JsonObject(IDictionary<string,object>). All numbers are parsed to doubles.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SimpleJson.DeserializeObject(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value
member.param: A JSON string.
member.returns: An IList<object>, a IDictionary<string,object>, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SimpleJson.TryDeserializeObject(System.String,System.Object@)
member.summary: Try parsing the json string into a value.
member.param: A JSON string.
The object.
member.returns: Returns true if successfull otherwise false.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SimpleJson.SerializeObject(System.Object,ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.IJsonSerializerStrategy)
member.summary: Converts a IDictionary<string,object> / IList<object> object into a JSON string
member.param: A IDictionary<string,object> / IList<object>
Serializer strategy to use
member.returns: A JSON encoded string, or null if object 'json' is not serializable

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.SimpleJson.IsNumeric(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines if a given object is numeric in any way (can be integer, double, null, etc).

member.name: T:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.WakeOnLanSettings
member.summary: Settings to handle wake-on-lan.

member.name: F:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.WakeOnLanSettings.DefaultTimeoutSeconds
member.summary: The default wake-on-lan timeout.

member.name: M:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.WakeOnLanSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Default settings constructor.

member.name: P:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.WakeOnLanSettings.Enabled
member.summary: Is wake-on-lan enabled to wake up the server if needed? Will only have effect if the server's MAC address(es) are set.

member.name: P:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.WakeOnLanSettings.MacAddresses
member.summary: The MAC address(es) of the server, separated by a ; character. This property will always be set after calling ServiceChannelFactories.Initialize(). Store this on the client to support wake-on-lan for future connections to the server.

member.name: P:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.WakeOnLanSettings.IPAddress
member.summary: The IP address of the server. This property will always be set after calling ServiceChannelFactories.Initialize(). Store this on the client to support wake-on-lan for future connections to the server.

member.name: P:ArgusTV.ServiceProxy.WakeOnLanSettings.TimeoutSeconds
member.summary: The maximum time in seconds to wait for the server to wake up, if wake-on-lan is turned on.
